content: the thinking of you angel is a heartfelt design created for yarnsgiving this angel makes a thoughtful gift for loved ones or a beautiful addition to your holiday décor crocheted with medium weight yarn and a 4 mm g hook the angel works up quickly and does not require stiffening to stand perfect for sharing warmth kindness and handmade love during the season of giving **pattern details ** * yarn medium worsted weight yarn * crochet hook 4 mm g * skill level easy/intermediate * time a few hours to complete **this pattern is forever free on my website ** > this pattern is available for free on > my website which is monetized by ads > if you prefer an ad-free version of > the pattern it is available to > purchase from my pattern shop ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2025 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
